mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id , a.auth_div_code , GBSLCVD.FN_GET_COMMCD(316,a.auth_div_code) as auth_div_name, a.auth_code , CASE WHEN a.auth_div_code = '0' THEN b.dept_name WHEN a.auth_div_Code = '1' THEN c.name END AS auth_name, a.valid_dt_from , a.valid_dt_to, a.user_id||a.auth_div_code||auth_code||valid_dt_from as row_id /* PK, AUIGrid key row setting */ FROM SYS0058M a LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0040M b ON a.auth_code = b.dept_id AND a.auth_div_code = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0005M c ON a.auth_code = c.brnch_id AND a.auth_div_code = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS0058M ( user_id, auth_div_code, auth_code, valid_dt_from, valid_dt_to, crt_user_id, crt_dt, upd_user_id, upd_dt ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{authDivCode}, #{authCode}, #{validDtFrom}, #{validDtTo}, #{crtUserId}, SYSDATE, #{updUserId}, SYSDATE )
